name: ACCIDENT
blurb: An external source caused you to manifest powers or perhaps the cure for an accident caused it.

abilityOptions.name: Area Alteration
abilityOptions.gameText: [Boost or Hinder] any number of nearby targets using [power]. Use your Max die.

abilityOptions.name: Inflict
abilityOptions.gameText: Attack using [power]. Hinder that same target using your Min die.

abilityOptions.name: Reflexive Burst
abilityOptions.gameText: When your personal zone changes, Attack all close enemy targets by rolling your single [power] die.

abilityOptions.name: Ambush Awareness
abilityOptions.gameText: If you haven't yet acted in an action scene, you may Defend against an Attack by rolling your single [power] die.

abilityOptions.name: Change in Circumstance
abilityOptions.gameText: When you change personal zones, you may Boost by rolling your single [power] die.

abilityOptions.name: Immunity
abilityOptions.gameText: You do not take damage from [energy/element].

name: TRAINING
blurb: The source of your powers is the result of your hard work, dedication, and long hours.

abilityOptions.name: Always Be Prepared
abilityOptions.gameText: Boost yourself using [power]. That bonus is persistent and exclusive. Then, Attack using your Min die. You may use the bonus you just created on that Attack.

abilityOptions.name: Reactive Field
abilityOptions.gameText: When you are attacked by a nearby enemy, the attacker also takes an equal amount of damage.

abilityOptions.name: Flowing Fight
abilityOptions.gameText: Attack using [power]. Use your Mid die to Attack one extra target for each bonus you have. Apply a different bonus to each Attack.

specialText: When you move to the next step, select an extra quality from that archetype's list at D8.

name: GENETIC
blurb: Mutations in your DNA have caused you to develop unusual abilities.

abilityOptions.name: Danger Sense
abilityOptions.gameText: When damaged by an environment target or a surprise Attack, Defend by rolling your single [power] die.

abilityOptions.name: Adaptive
abilityOptions.gameText: Boost yourself using [power], then either remove a penalty on yourself or Recover using your Min die.

abilityOptions.name: Area Assault
abilityOptions.gameText: Attack multiple targets using [power], using your Min die against each.

abilityOptions.name: Growth
abilityOptions.gameText: Boost yourself using [quality]. That bonus is persistent and exclusive.

abilityOptions.name: Rally
abilityOptions.gameText: Attack using [quality]. Other nearby heroes in the Yellow or Red zone Recover equal to your Min die.

name: EXPERIMENTATION
blurb: Your powers were created in a lab and had some unexpected side effects.

abilityOptions.name: Personal Upgrade
abilityOptions.gameText: Boost yourself using [power]. Use your Max die. That bonus is persistent and exclusive.

abilityOptions.name: Misdirection
abilityOptions.gameText: When a nearby hero in the Yellow or Red zone would take damage, Defend against that damage by rolling your single [power] die, then redirect any remaining damage to a nearby minion of your choice.

abilityOptions.name: Throw Minion
abilityOptions.gameText: Attack a minion using [power]. The result of the minion's save Attacks another target of your choice.

abilityOptions.name: Overpower
abilityOptions.gameText: Whenever you are Boosted, increas that bonus by +1. Then if that bonus is +5 or higher, take damage equal to that bonus and remove it.

abilityOptions.name: Unflagging
abilityOptions.gameText: At the start of your turn, remove a penalty on yourself.

name: MYSTICAL
blurb: Your magical training or alteration by magic gives you your powers.

abilityOptions.name: Modification Wave
abilityOptions.gameText: Boost or Hinder using [power], and apply that mod to multiple nearby targets.

abilityOptions.name: Mystic Redirection
abilityOptions.gameText: When another hero in the Yellow or Red zone would take damage, you may redirect it to yourself and Defend against it by rolling your single [power] die.

abilityOptions.name: Sever Link
abilityOptions.gameText: Overcome an environmental challenge using [power]. Use your Max die. Either remove any penalty in the scene or Boost equal to your Mid die.

specialText: Gain an Information quality and assign a D10 to it.

name: NATURE
blurb: The power of nature flows through you.

abilityOptions.name: Call to the Wild
abilityOptions.gameText: Gain a D8 minion. It takes its turn before yours, but goes away at the end of the scene. You may only have one such minion at a time.

abilityOptions.name: Predator's Eye
abilityOptions.gameText: Attack using [power]. Use your Max+Min dice. Then gain a Boost using your Mid die. The target of the Attack gains a bonus of the same size.

abilityOptions.name: Wild Strength
abilityOptions.gameText: When you defeat a minion, roll that minion's die and Boost yourself using that roll to create a bonus for your next action.

abilityOptions.name: Grasping Vine
abilityOptions.gameText: Hinder using [power]. Use your Max die. You may split that penalty across multiple nearby targets.

abilityOptions.name: Natural Weapon
abilityOptions.gameText: Attack using [power]. Use your Max die.

name: RELIC
blurb: An object (or collection of objects) of mystical significance either grants you powers or altered you to give you powers.

abilityOptions.name: Harvest Life Force
abilityOptions.gameText: Attack using [power]. Use your Min die. Take damage equal to your Mid die, and one nearby ally Recovers Health equal to your Max die.

abilityOptions.name: Magical Shield
abilityOptions.gameText: When another hero in the Yellow or Red zone qould take damage, you may Defend them by rolling your single [power] die.

abilityOptions.name: Momentary Power
abilityOptions.gameText: Boost yourself using [power]. Use your Max die. Hinder a nearby opponent with your Min die.

abilityOptions.name: Relic Drain
abilityOptions.gameText: Hinder using [power]. Also Recover Health equal to your Min die.

abilityOptions.name: Draw Power
abilityOptions.gameText: Boost yourself using [power]. That bonus is persistent and exclusive.

abilityOptions.name: Punishment
abilityOptions.gameText: Whenever you Attack an enemy that has inflicted a penalty on you, treat that penalty as if it were a bonus for the purpose of that Attack.

name: POWERED SUIT
blurb: An engineered suit provides you with your powers, and may even be important to keeping you alive.

name: RADIATION
blurb: Exposure to radiation has charged your system and given you new abilities.

name: TECH UPGRADES
blurb: You have technological upgrades and implants that give you your powers.

name: SUPERNATURAL
blurb: In some way, you have pierced the veil of life and reality and brought back power.

name: ARTIFICIAL BEING
blurb: You were created, not born, and your abilities simply stem from your makeup.

name: CURSED
blurb: A supernatural curse has been inflicted upon you or your family line, granting both boons and banes.

name: ALIEN
blurb: You are not from Earth, though your powers might not be all that unusual where you come from, or you've been granted abilities by an extraterrestrial source.

name: GENIUS
blurb: The source of your powers is your brilliant mind. You have put your staggering intellect to the task of fighting crime.

name: COSMOS
blurb: Exposure to forces from beyond the stars have changed you.

name: EXTRADIMENSIONAL
blurb: Exposure to side dimensions like the Realm of Discord has left its mark on you.

name: UNKNOWN
blurb: You don't know the source of your powers: they either just manifested one day, or hint at a bigger mystery.

name: HIGHER POWER
blurb: You have been chosen by a higher force or are being from another realm. Your powers are a reflection of your calling or true form.

name: THE MULTIVERSE
blurb: You have traveled or been flung through the realm of time and space. Without the multiverse itself, you would not be who you are now.
